metadata.name: Suspicious Encoded PowerShell Command Line
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious powershell process starts with base64 encoded commands (e.g. Emotet)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' jab')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' suvyi')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' sqbfafga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' aqblahga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' awv4i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' iaa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' iab')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' uwb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' cwb'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe -encod ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ba^j e-'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -executionpolicy remotesigned ')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious powershell process starts with base64 encoded commands (e.g. Emotet)
